info.description:
This API will return POS Daily Product Ranking by Sales or Volume data fromi Aramark's Enterprise POS.


The base endpoint URL for this API in production is:
`https://marko.aramark.net/v1/pos/daily/product`.


For testing the API with the "Try" tool on this page or in your app, use either our testing server "qa-marko" or our development server "dev-marko".
info.title: POS Daily Product Ranking

get.description:
Returns POS Daily Product Rankings by Sales

![This endpoint is in production](/themes/portal/images/statuspngs/statusprod.png)

size.description: Number of records returned with the result set

get.description:
Returns ALL POS Daily Product Ranking by Volume

![This endpoint is in production](/themes/portal/images/statuspngs/statusprod.png)

size.description: Number of records returned with the result set

rankParam.name: rank
rankParam.description: Number of Highest Rank to Return. (range 1-20 or "ALL")

hierarchyParam.name: hierarchy
hierarchyParam.description: Product hierarchy to group ranking by

sizeParam.name: size
sizeParam.description: Number of records to be returned in each page of result set

bypassCacheParam.name: bypass-cache
bypassCacheParam.description: This HTTP Header variable will bypass cache

smokeParam.name: smoke
smokeParam.description: When set to 'true' this HTTP header variable will route the API call to the Integration testing environment.  Only applicable in QA.

apikey.name: apikey
apikey.description: This HTTP Header variable will verify security

product_family.description: Name of Aramark Product Family [Only applicable if hierarchy=family]

product_department.description: Name of Aramark Product Department [Only applicable if hierarchy=department]

rank.description: Product rank number returned by operations based on total sales

product_family.description: Name of Aramark Product Family [Only applicable if hierarchy=family]

product_department.description: Name of Aramark Product Department [Only applicable if hierarchy=department]

rank.description: Product rank number returned by operations based on total volume
